import React from "react" import { translationHelper } from '../../../../helpers'; import { Row, Col, Label } from "reactstrap" import { AvForm, AvField } from "availity-reactstrap-validation" import AvGroup from "availity-reactstrap-validation/lib/AvGroup" const ProposalSection = (props) => { const t = translationHelper('commercial_credit'); return (
{ t("Proposal") }
 ); } export default ProposalSection;
